meanings.definition: A long, loose garment covering the whole body from head to feet, worn in public by many Muslim women.
meanings.sent1: In some countries, women wear burkas for religious reasons.
meanings.sent2: She chose to wear a burka to the event as a sign of respect for the culture.
meanings.sent3: The burkas at the store were all colorful and eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: Her burka was like a shield, protecting her from prying eyes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the flowing burkas in the market stayed with her long after she left.

meanings.sent1: The costume designer created a burka-inspired dress for the play.
meanings.sent2: He wore a burka-like cloak to the masquerade ball.
meanings.sent3: The burkas on the runway were modern twists on the traditional design.
meanings.sent4: Her scarf draped over her head like a burka, adding mystery to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The mannequin in the window displayed a striking burka-style gown.
